LanguageData.Tatami_Green.label: Tatami(Green)
LanguageData.Tatami_Green.description: It’s made of a straw called "Igusa". Tatami has a function to purify air and adjust humidity.Also flame retardancy is very good so it will not burn even if a fire occurs.
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.label: Tatami(Yellow)
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.description: It’s made of a straw called "Igusa". Tatami has a function to purify air and adjust humidity.Also flame retardancy is very good so it will not burn even if a fire occurs.
LanguageData.RBCeramicTile.label: RBセラミックのタイル
LanguageData.RBCeramicTile.description: 表面がツルツルしているため清潔性を保ちやすいですが抗菌タイルには劣ります。
LanguageData.ZP_Soil.label: Soil
LanguageData.ZP_Soil.description: (Fertility:100%)\nMake the land possible for agriculture\nSoil will be placed on sand, ice, gravel, rough stone, smooth stone.
LanguageData.ZP_SoilRich.label: Fertile Soil
LanguageData.ZP_SoilRich.description: (Fertility:140%)\nImprove agriculturally possible soil to Rich Soil.
LanguageData.ZP_Mud.label: Mud
LanguageData.ZP_Mud.description: Mud the soil for paddy fields.
LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.label: Reclaimed soil
LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.description: (Fertility:50)\nFill a place with poor footing.\nMud, swamp, shallow, coastal current is reclaimed.
